pages.title: Muslee Power Bar
pages.text: Actually 'Muslee Melange Power Bar', or 'MÃ¼sli-Bar'. This is a cerial bar with a variety of edible ingredients mixed in (hence, 'melange').$(br2)You can produce it on the go with the $(o)Power Bar Press$(), and eat as much of it as you like, even if your belly is almost bursting.

$(br2) $(br2) $(br)Eating it takes much less time that a full meal (as commonly known, power bars are gone in a second).$(br2)Nutritions and nourishment values are comparable to a $(o)Golden Carrot$().
